title: Small Businesses Build Their Own Supply Chains
description: They’re shifting to domestic sourcing and production, like some big manufacturers, but with at least one advantage the giants don’t have.
dc:creator: Amy Haimerl
media:credit: Mark Abramson for The New York Times
media:description: Forloh, a company that makes technical hunting gear, designs and assembles its products from a factory run by Tough Stitch/Drift Dry in Vernon, Calif.
